resources.string:
Cha-Ching Exchange is a simple and easy to use live currency converter, aimed at anyone who requires live exchange rate information for up to 32 world currencies. It also has offline functionality for anyone travelling abroad, or simply out of coverage range where live information is not available. All offline information will be correct to the last time the currency information was downloaded.

Instructions

Simply enter the amount you want to convert then choose a base currency. Also click on result currencies for graph comparison data

Main menu options

Currency chooser:
Result currencies can be turned on and off

Offline mode:
This toggles offline mode

Clear offline cache:
Removes ALL offline data for all currencies

Clear pinned currencies:
If you have pinned any favourite currencies then this option clears all the pins (see below for pinning a currency)

Currency menu options

Pin Currency:
This option allows you to ‘pin’ any favourite currencies. Pressing the ‘pin toggle’ in the menu quickly and easily switches between the two

Set as base currency:
Changes the current base currency

Remove offline cache:
This option will remove individual offline currency data (available offline data for each currency is denoted by the download symbol)

Show 1, 5 day or 1 year graph:
Live graph data will be downloaded for rate comparison against selected base currency
